body:
Hi Giuseppe,



As far as I can see Ladybug runs fine on your system. Why are you concerned about ladybug problems?



Back to Honeybee, the error happens when the component tries to create the folder c:\ladybug on your system. I assume you have already the folder created on your system (since Ladybug is running fine). If not can you create c:\ladybug manually and try again?



I have never seen this error before. Let me know if it solves the issue.



Mostapha
